title: Successful Email/Password Authentication
description: Verify that a user can sign in successfully using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input valid registered email address.
Input correct password for the email.
Click the sign-in button.
Verify the user is redirected to the Dashboard page with appropriate access.

title: Failed Email/Password Authentication with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that authentication fails and shows a descriptive error message when the password is incorrect.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input valid registered email address.
Input incorrect password.
Click the sign-in button.
Verify the appropriate authentication error message appears explaining invalid credentials.

title: Successful Google Sign-In Authentication
description: Verify that a user can sign in successfully using Google sign-in method.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Click on the Google Sign-In button.
Complete Google authentication flow in the popup.
Verify the user is redirected to the Dashboard page with valid session.

title: Authentication Error Handling for Firebase Unauthorized Domain
description: Verify the app displays a user-friendly error message when Firebase returns an 'unauthorized domain' error during authentication.

steps.description: Force an authentication attempt from an unauthorized domain or simulate the error.
Verify a clear, descriptive error message is displayed to the user.

title: Plan Gating for Free Plan User Accessing Dashboard
description: Verify that a user with Free plan is redirected to the Upgrade page when attempting to access the Dashboard.

steps.description: Authenticate as a user with the Free plan.
Attempt to navigate to the /dashboard route.
Verify the user is redirected to the /upgrade page.

title: Dashboard Access for Starter Plan and Above
description: Verify that users with Starter, Pro, or Premium plans can access and view the Dashboard with all analytics and overview components.

steps.description: Authenticate as a user with Starter plan or higher.
Navigate to the /dashboard route.
Verify the dashboard page loads with overview and analytics components visible.

title: Theme Switching Between Light and Dark Mode
description: Verify the user can switch between light and dark themes using the theme switcher UI component and that the preferred theme persists.

steps.description: Navigate to a page with the theme switcher.
Toggle the theme switcher to dark mode.
Verify the UI switches to dark mode styles immediately.
Reload the page.
Validate the dark theme preference is persisted and applied on page load.

title: Currency Switching Reflects in UI
description: Verify that changing the currency via the currency switcher updates displayed currency values correctly throughout the UI.

steps.description: Log in to the app and navigate to a page showing currency prices or amounts.
Open the currency switcher and select a different currency.
Verify all currency amounts in the UI update to match the selected currency.

title: Language Selection Updates UI Text Dynamically
description: Verify that selecting a different language from the language selector updates all UI text dynamically without a page reload.

steps.description: Navigate to any page with text content.
Open the language selector and pick a different supported language.
Validate that all UI text updates promptly to the selected language.

title: Protected Route Redirects Unauthenticated User to Sign-In Page
description: Verify that any attempt to access protected routes such as /dashboard by unauthenticated users results in redirecting them to the sign-in page.

steps.description: Clear authentication session or use a fresh browser session.
Navigate directly to the /dashboard route.
Verify the user is redirected to /auth/sign-in.

title: PWA Installation and Offline Capability
description: Verify that the Progressive Web App can be installed on supported devices and behaves correctly offline using cached assets and data.

steps.description: Access the app from a supported browser that supports PWA install prompts.
Trigger the PWA install prompt and complete the installation.
Verify the app installs correctly and launches as a standalone installed app.
Disconnect the internet connection and relaunch the installed app.
Check that key pages load using cached content and no errors are thrown.

title: Landing Page Hero Section and VAYRA Logo Animation
description: Verify the landing page hero section displays the animated VAYRA logo crisply and responsively across different viewport sizes.

steps.description: Visit the landing page on desktop viewport.
Verify the VAYRA logo is crisp, single instance, and its animation works properly.
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile sizes.
Verify the logo scales and animates appropriately without distortion or layout shifts.

title: Accessibility Compliance On Landing and Authentication Pages
description: Ensure no critical accessibility violations exist and the app conforms to WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, focus outlines, and screen reader support.

steps.description: Run axe-core or similar accessibility audit on the landing page.
Verify zero critical accessibility violations are detected.
Navigate to the authentication pages.
Validate no critical accessibility violations occur on pages.
Test keyboard navigation through all interactive elements on landing and auth pages.
Focus outlines are visible and navigation is logical and sequential.
Use a screen reader to verify all UI text and UI controls are properly labeled and readable.

title: Routing Console Has No Errors or Warnings
description: Verify that navigating and interacting within key routes (/ , /auth/sign-in, /dashboard) does not produce any console errors or warnings.

steps.description: Open browser console and navigate to the landing page.
Verify no errors or warnings appear in console.
Navigate to the sign-in page.
Verify console remains free of errors and warnings.
Sign in with any valid user and navigate to dashboard.
Confirm no console errors or warnings during dashboard session.

title: Animations Respect Prefers-Reduced-Motion Setting
description: Verify UI animations are disabled or simplified for users who have the prefers-reduced-motion media query enabled.

steps.description: Enable 'prefers-reduced-motion' in the operating system or browser.
Load app pages with known animations like landing page hero and navigation transitions.
Confirm animations are disabled or replaced with non-motion alternatives with no layout shifts or jank.

title: Verify Branding Assets Load Correctly
description: Ensure all branding assets including /brand/vayra-logo.svg and icons load without 404 errors across all pages.

steps.description: Load landing, authentication, and dashboard pages.
Verify in network tab that all branding asset requests return HTTP 200 and no 404 errors occur.

title: Favicons and PWA Manifest Icons Load and Match Maskable Standards
description: Verify all favicon and PWA manifest icons are accessible with HTTP 200 responses and comply with maskable icon standards.

steps.description: Request all favicon and PWA manifest icons URLs including maskable icons.
Verify all respond with HTTP 200 and meet sizing and maskable icon requirements.

title: Error Boundary Catches Unexpected Errors
description: Verify that when a component or route throws an unexpected error, the error boundary displays a graceful fallback UI with a user-friendly error message.

steps.description: Simulate or trigger an exception in a React component within the app.
Verify the error boundary catches the error and displays the fallback error UI with descriptive message and no white screen.

title: Upgrade Flow Navigation and Plan Selection
description: Verify that the Upgrade page allows users to view plan tiers, select a plan upgrade, and redirects appropriately post-upgrade.

steps.description: Log in as a Free plan user and navigate to the Upgrade page.
Verify that all plans (Starter, Pro, Premium) are listed with clear features.
Select a plan to upgrade and confirm the upgrade action.
Verify that the plan change is saved and that the user can now access the Dashboard.
